description: Try our easy to follow Mushroom & Mascarpone Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mushroom & Mascarpone Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 clove garlic (crushed whole with the back of a knife or with your hand)
2 salted anchovies in oil (drained and chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Arrange the mushrooms on a baking tray lined with baking parchment, and toss with the olive oil, garlic, lemon zest and juice, and anchovies. Season with salt and black pepper. Roast for 35-45 minutes until tender and golden. Set aside to cool.

Put the mushroom purée in a serving bowl with the mascarpone cheese, and stir through gently. Season well, stir again, and sprinkle with the extra parsley leaves. Drizzle with a little extra virgin olive oil (if using), and sprinkle with the paprika. Serve with thickly cut slices of grilled or toasted ciabatta.
